title: Does Hunter Biden Want Out? | Guests: Tom Fitton & Salena Zito | 10/21/20
description:
Rudy Giuliani released even more Hunter Biden information alleging some terrible things, and a new photo emerged allegedly of Joe Biden meeting with Hunter’s Kazakhstani business partners. Giuliani joins Glenn tonight, so listeners call in with questions for him. If Hunter did drop off this laptop, is it a sign of self-sabotage? Glenn dives into another communist plan, this one from the 1960s, and how it’s coming true in modern-day America. Jason Buttrill talks the most recent Hunter Biden revelations. Tom Fitton of Judicial Watch discusses his new book, “A Republic Under Assault," and the real effects of the COVID-19 lockdowns. Reporter Salena Zito has noticed a trend of voters considering voting Biden to “end the chaos." 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
